SEARCH
Package ws.rest.politicians.resource

Class PoliticianResource

java.lang.Object
ws.rest.politicians.resource.PoliticianResource
@Path("/politicians") public class PoliticianResource extends Object
This class implements multiple HTTP methods to interact with the politicians resource in the REST web service.
Since:
2023-04-14
Version:
1.0
Author:
Courtin Florent

  • Constructor Details

    • PoliticianResource

      public PoliticianResource()

  • Method Details

    • addPolitician

      @POST @Consumes("application/xml") @Produces("application/xml") public javax.ws.rs.core.Response addPolitician(Politician p)
      HTTP POST method that allows to add a politician in the REST web service (and database). The political party (which is a foreign key in Politican table) of the politician must be added before, otherwise the request will be refused.
      Parameters:
      p - The politician to add
      Returns:
      Return a Response object according to the state of the request

    • getPolitician

      @GET @Path("/{id}") @Produces("application/xml") public javax.ws.rs.core.Response getPolitician(@PathParam("id") String id)
      HTTP GET method that allows to get politician informations with his id.
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the politician
      Returns:
      Return a Response object according to the state of the request

    • getAllPoliticians

      @GET @Produces("application/xml") public javax.ws.rs.core.Response getAllPoliticians(@QueryParam("party_id") String partyIdRestriction)
      HTTP GET method that allows to get all politicians, or all politicians from the same political party.
      Parameters:
      partyIdRestriction - The parameter the restrict the resultset to politicians from a certain political party. Set with null to disable restriction.
      Returns:
      Return a Response object according to the state of the request

    • deletePolitician

      @DELETE @Path("/{id}") public javax.ws.rs.core.Response deletePolitician(@PathParam("id") String id)
      HTTP DELETE method that allow to delete a politician in the REST web service.
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the politician to delete
      Returns:
      Return a Response object according to the state of the request
